TI_DOC.P: EIB - Main road M-18 - Completion of construction works - section Kladanj – Podpaklenik (BA-Sarajevo)

STI_DOC.P: Contract award notice Results of the procurement procedure
Bosnia and Herzegovina, Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: JP Ceste Federacije BiH d.o.o. Sarajevo
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Internet address(es): General address of the contracting authority:

TXT_MARK.P: Body governed based on public law – Public company for road management
General public services – Main roads management
II.1.1)Title: Works for completion on Main Road M-18, section Kladanj — Podpaklenik including Karaula Mountain Pass No: BA/EIB/RMFBH/S/ICB/1/16
II.1.4) Short description: Works for completion on Main Road M-18, section Kladanj – Podpaklenik including Karaula Mountain Pass include:
— construction of carriageway at the portion of P134 - P135 and P190 - P253 L = 2 702m1,
— construction of bridge no 13: Reinforced concrete slab structure with 9 spans, total L = 284m1,
— construction of bridge no 14: Reinforced concrete slab structure with 6 spans, total L = 130m1,
— construction of upper wearing course of carriageway from the road base before the tunnel portal at P140 — P173 and behind it at P174 — P190.
II.1.7) Total value of the procurement (excluding VAT)
II.2.1) Title: Works for Completion on Main Road M-18, section Kladanj — Podpaklenik including Karaula Mountain Pass Nº: BA/EIB/RMFBH/S/ICB/1/16
NUTS code: BA Main Road M-18, section Kladanj – Podpaklenik
Works for completion on Main Road M-18, section Kladanj – Podpaklenik including Karaula Mountain Pass
The contract is related to a project and/or programme financed by European Union funds: No Financing from EIB Loan BA 82.137
V.2.1) Date of conclusion of the contract: 2.2.2018
V.2.3) Name and address of the Contractor.
JV Euroasfalt doo & GP ŽGP Sarajevo
V.2.4) Information on value of the Contract (excluding VAT)
This is a recurrent procurement: No
Federal Ministry of Transport and Communications
VI.4.3) Service from which information about the review procedure may be obtained
Federal Ministry of Transport and Communications

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Date of dispatch of this notice

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: JP Ceste Federacije BiH d.o.o. Sarajevo

General public services – Main roads management
II.1.1)Title: Works for completion on Main Road M-18, section Kladanj — Podpaklenik including Karaula Mountain Pass No: BA/EIB/RMFBH/S/ICB/1/16
II.1.4) Short description: Works for completion on Main Road M-18, section Kladanj – Podpaklenik including Karaula Mountain Pass include:
— construction of carriageway at the portion of P134 - P135 and P190 - P253 L = 2 702m1,
— construction of bridge no 13: Reinforced concrete slab structure with 9 spans, total L = 284m1,
— construction of bridge no 14: Reinforced concrete slab structure with 6 spans, total L = 130m1,
— construction of upper wearing course of carriageway from the road base before the tunnel portal at P140 — P173 and behind it at P174 — P190.
II.1.7) Total value of the procurement (excluding VAT)
